HotelElement.Name: *bw Plus Airport Inn & Suites Salt Lake City

Description.Text: Salt Lake Airport hotel is close to downtown Salt Lake City so you can enjoy everything the city has to offer. As a new hotel, we offer a facility thats clean, modern and comfortable. Guests are minutes from LDS Temple Square, and its easy to take in a soccer game of REAL Salt Lake. With City Creek Center shopping at your doorstep, your trip will start out on the right note.
